name: Columbiana Web Works
tag_list: web-design, web-hosting, web-redesign, search-engine-optimization, search-engine-marketing, seo, sem, website-audit
overview:
Columbiana Web Works provides full-service web solutions for South Carolina small business owners.

We specialize in website design and hosting for emerging and new businesses. Our web designs are simple, functional, and provide a solid basis for an emerging online presence. Columbiana takes the needs and attitudes of the small business into consideration during the design process. After the website is operational, Columbiana can host the website locally; when you need support for your website or the server that it is on, we’re here to meet with you if need be to get the problem resolved in a timely fashion.

Our search engine optimization (SEO) and search engine marketing (SEM) services can get your website the traffic that you want while increasing your online presence and visibility.

Located in Columbia, South Carolina, we are in the heart of the Capital City. Columbiana Web Works gladly meets with business owners for a free, no-obligation consultation to discover what services would best match the company’s needs.
